org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.gve

Class GVEGraphLayoutFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.common.BaseFactory
      • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.gve.GVEGraphLayoutFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementFactoryProvider<EPGMGraphHead,EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>, BaseLayoutFactory<EPGMGraphHead,EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>, LogicalGraphLayoutFactory<EPGMGraphHead,EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexedGVEGraphLayoutFactory

    public class GVEGraphLayoutFactory
extends BaseFactory
implements LogicalGraphLayoutFactory<EPGMGraphHead,EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>
    Responsible for creating a GVELayout from given data.

        Description copied from interface: LogicalGraphLayoutFactory
        Creates a logical graph layout from given graphHead, vertex and edge datasets. The method assumes that the given vertices and edges are already assigned to the given graph head.
